item.title: End UT-127 East at UT-108
item.description: End UT-127 East (Antelope Drive) at UT-108 (N 2000 W). Turn left on N 2000 W for UT-108 North; continue straight on Antelope Drive for UT-108 South.

item.title: UT-127 East Approaching UT-108
item.description: UT-127 East (Antelope Drive) approaching UT-108 (N 2000 W) in Syracuse.

item.title: UT-108 North at UT-79
item.description: UT-108 North (Midland Drive) at UT-79 (Hinckley Drive)

item.title: UT-108 North at UT-97
item.description: UT-108 North (S 3500 W) at UT-97 (W 5600 S) in Roy.

item.title: Antelope Drive West at I-15 and UT-108
item.description: Antelope Drive West at I-15 North to Ogden. Continue over freeway for I-15 south to Salt Lake City. Antelope Drive West becomes UT-108 South.

item.title: Antelope Drive West Approaching I-15 and UT-108
item.description: Antelope Drive West approaching I-15 North to Ogden. Use inner right hand turn lane for 1400 West. Antelope Drive West becomes UT-108 South.

item.title: End UT-108 South at I-15
item.description: End UT-108 South at I-15 in Layton. Use I-15 north for Ogden. Use outer left turn lane for 1400 West. Continue east for East Antelope Drive .

item.title: UT-108 East at I-15 South (Exit 332)
item.description: UT-108 East at I-15 South (Exit 332) in Layton. Use I-15 south for Salt Lake City. Continue over freeway for I-15 North to Ogden.

item.title: UT-108 East at UT-126
item.description: UT-108 East (Antelope Drive) at UT-126 (N Main St.). Continue east on Antelope Drive for I-15.

item.title: UT-108 East at UT-127
item.description: UT-108 East (N 2000 W) at UT-127 (Antelope Drive) in Syracuse. Turn left to continue east on UT-108.

item.title: UT-97 West at UT-108
item.description: UT-97 West (W 5600 S) at UT-108 (S 3500 W) in Roy.

item.title: I-15 North - Exit 332
item.description: I-15 North at Exit 332 - UT-108/Antelope Drive.
